name: Unstable Ascend
description:
Climb the platforms to get to the spaceship before 60 seconds are up!

Arrow keys or WASD to move. 

Dirt blocks (brown) are unstable, and Iron blocks (gray) are stable. 

This is my first game jam, so don't expect too much, and have fun!

Credits:

Art and code are by me. 

Music: https://www.bensound.com/
